Needed: Volunteers for Blind Date Auction

13
Maetriks
Thursday, August 24th, 2017, 9:25:25 PM

As part of the Autumnal Glory Festival, House Aspis and the Alliance of High Elven Society will be holding a Blind Date Auction. If you're not familiar with this, that's fine! Participants will provide non-identifying information which will be used for the auction and winners will receive the name of their date the following night at the Costume Cotillion! Looking for at least 10 volunteers to be auctioned off, 5 female, 5 male, and ALL RACES ARE WELCOME! If you would like to take part in this, please fill out the form linked here.

Disclaimer: Any activities must be agreed upon by both parties once payment is received, however this is in no way meant as a means to solicit untoward activities. Participants (on either side) are fully encouraged to exercise their right to say no to any questionable or unwelcome requests.

I'm proud to announce we have surpassed our goal of 10 registrants for the Blind Date Auction, and can include a secret celebrity among the mix! If you wish to be auctioned, get your registration form in soon as this will be the last weekend for such.
